Nightlight:

Nighlight nodded she was waitting for her new beast mode, or m=
ore accurately her old beeast mode

From: Sandy Panico 
Sent: Sunday, July =
24, 2011 9:20 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: MEdic Bay




Nig=
htshift nods in agreement.

" Good point, you're right.  Tucson tends ta be=
 too much of a risk taker and I think thats what got 'em that time."

Perpe=
tually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Jul 24, 2011, at 3:52 AM, Airs=
hadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


    
  Nightlight:

  =E2=
=80=9CNot sure what to say about that  =E2=80=9Dreplied Nighlight =E2=80=9C=
All the Autobos and maximals think in others instead to themselves in first=
 place=E2=80=9D

  From: Sandy Panico 
  Sent: Saturday, July 23, 2011 11:2=
2 AM
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Subject: Re: MEdic Bay




  Nightshif=
t looks to Nightlight with a smile.  He could see that she was holding onto=
 those memories as he suggested.  Gradually his damages were being repaired=
 and he could now shift his position a little more easily.  Still his servo=
s were quite stiff from the side impact trauma he endured in his vehicle fo=
rm.  

  " Master Yokitron did say that fate had strange ways of determinin=
g one's future and that no matter what we do, there's no way we can alter i=
t's course.  He was right.  No matter what happens now, fate is always gonn=
a be the deciding factor on how things pan out from now on.  No one can pre=
dict what's gonna happen, and whatever happens all we gotta do is roll with=
 situations as they come up.  I think Tucson Prime's aware of that but I kn=
ow he wants ta fight the odds.  Even before he got promoted, he's always be=
en like that.  He wants freedom and peace for this planet and for us, and h=
e's not gonna back down until he gets what he wants.  I only wish he'd save=
 a little something for himself, he's always think'n of us before he thinks=
 of himself.  I dunno about everyone else but, I don't wanna lose him.  He'=
s one of the best friends, soldiers and friends we got on our side.  I just=
 don't think he realizes that and he should."

  He heaves a sigh while con=
tinuing his repair session.

  Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.=
 

  On Jul 23, 2011, at 2:27 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...=
m> wrote:


      
    Nightlight:

    Nightlight smiled remembering all t=
he happy moments that she had shared with her husband and daughter

    Fro=
m: Sandy Panico 
    Sent: Friday, July 22, 2011 4:38 PM
    To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com 
    Subject: Re: MEdic Bay




    Nightshift gives a smile. =
 

    " Hold onto those memories, they're priceless.  Noth'n compares ta t=
he memories of good times and moments spent with the one ya love."

    Per=
petually on the move and constantly busy. 

    On Jul 22, 2011, at 2:53 AM=
, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


        
      Nigtl=
ight:

      =E2=80=9CYes, Love is so powerfull=E2=80=9Dsighed the femme wh=
iule still she remembers all the happy moments that she had spent with Rodi=
mus even inside the Black Fortress.

      From: Sandy Panico 
      Sent: =
Thursday, July 21, 2011 7:59 AM
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sub=
ject: Re: MEdic Bay




      Nightshift smiles and gently holds Nightlight=
's hand.

      " And don't ever let anyone take that away from ya.  Love i=
s more valuable than energon and it lasts forever.  There's plenty of that =
here alright, lets hope we can hold inta that for a long time. "

      He =
shifts his position on the repair bench.

      " This sure reminds me of R=
atchet's med bay.  I must've ended up there so many times that I lost count=
.  But it wasn't for stupid reasons, usually because of freak ambush attemp=
ts by Decepticon speedsters.  I sure hated those guys, I wasn't as fast as =
they were and they knew it.  So of course they'd always chose me as their t=
arget.  Ratchet was aware of that, and he never got agitated when I came in=
.  But what was worse, I'd never hear the end of it from Sunstreaker and Si=
deswipe.  Slag, those two were always rank'n on me.  But I tried ta ignore =
'em.  Then one day, Ohh this is sweet, one day it happened again and I woun=
d back up in Ratchet's office. Tucson was mak'n a delivery of supplies befo=
re he got shot blind, and those two were pull'n their scrap on me.  Well, n=
ot only did he hear them, he saw them do'n it and slag, you didn't wanna be=
 around Tucson that time, because he had the look of destruction in his eye=
s.  Now mind ya, they knew better not ta scrap around with him because he'd=
 slag 'em real good if they did.  All they had ta do was look into his opti=
cs and they turned around and apologized ta me without a single word outa T=
ucson's mouth.  After that, it never happened again."

      He sighs gentl=
y.

      " Happy ta say that there was never any ridicule ever said about =
anyone after that.  Optimus was glad about that, so he let Tucson's temper =
slide somewhat.  It kept the speedsters in line and guys like us, Hound, Tr=
ail Breaker, and Beach Comber were happy not ta get ranked on because of ou=
r lack of speed.  And definitely no one ever messed with Ratchet.  Ohh no, =
that was considered taboo.  Maan I sure miss those times."

      Perpetual=
ly on the move and constantly busy. 

      On Jul 21, 2011, at 3:11 AM, Ai=
rshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


          
        Night=
light:

        =E2=80=9CI=E2=80=99m very lucky to have Rodimus in my life=
=E2=80=9Dsaid Nightlight =E2=80=9CThat and the birth of Elita were the best=
 things that happened in my life=E2=80=9D

        From: Sandy Panico 
    =
    Sent: Tuesday, July 19, 2011 8:50 AM
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com=
 
        Subject: Re: MEdic Bay




        Nightshift turns his head to N=
ightlight and reaches out to put a friendly hand on hers, to show his suppo=
rt.

        " It's okay, Bump knows what he's do'n.  In no time you'll be =
back on your feet bust'n Predacon and Decepticon aft from here back ta Cybe=
rtron.  And none of those jokers are gonna think twice about mess'n with yo=
u again. You got someth'n they don't have, and never will have, a good spar=
k in you spark chamber."

        He then lies back in his repair chamber.
=

        " Rodimus is real lucky ta have someone like you in his life.  I n=
ever got the chance ta find someone back home.  Always too many things go'n=
 on and no time for relationships.  If I could tell the other Autobots some=
th'n I'd tell them ta enjoy the little things in life, the simple pleasures=
 it has ta offer.  Because if ya don't enjoy them while you're alive, you'l=
l never get the chance again after you're gone."  

        Perpetually on =
the move and constantly busy. 

        On Jul 19, 2011, at 2:22 AM, Airsha=
dow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


            
          Night=
light:

          "I can stand it"said firmly the femme "you can start when=
 you consider it 
          ready"

          -----Original Message----- 
 =
         From: Sandy Panico
          Sent: Monday, July 18, 2011 12:36 PM
=
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
          Subject: Re: MEdic Bay

    =
      Nightshift nods casually to Bump.

          " Just keep me as is, wi=
thout the dents and damage, a set of all weather, 
          all terrain ti=
res, heavy duty if they're available and a launching system 
          for =
my alt mode so I can deploy grenades as well as missile darts. Oh 
        =
  yeah, new suspension system and a refresher paint job and rust prevention=
 
          treatment."

          He smiles.

          "Just kidd'n about=
 the paint job thing."

          Perpetually on the move and constantly bu=
sy.

          On Jul 18, 2011, at 8:02 AM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@g=
mail.com> wrote:

          >> <OLD>
          >>
          >> =E2=80=9CHow=
 longer have I to wait to leave this place and get my beast mode?=E2=80=9Ds=
aid
          >> Nightlight and then she looked at Nightshift and said =E2=
=80=9CI remember you,
          >> you were one of the maximals that were t=
rapped in the throne room of
          >> Blackfortress=E2=80=9D
          =
>
          > <NEW>
          >
          > There was an understanding nod =
from BUMP, "We will have you out of
          > here just as soon as we can=
." He walked over to NIGHTLIGHT and
          > activated a small viewscree=
n next to her bed. "Fuzors are far more
          > difficult to do, but it=
 is possible."
          >
          > There was a smile from the physist, =
"Remember, they were originaly
          > created from a mistake in the sc=
anners. But I think we have a way to
          > reproduce it controllably,=
 as long as you think your spark can handle
          > it."
          >
  =
        >> <OLD>
          >>
          >> Nightshift looks to Nightlight w=
ith a friendly smile. He was happy to 
          >> see
          >> that N=
ightlight remembered who he was. He had also been concerned for 
          =
>> her
          >> safety as were the others.
          >>
          >> " =
And I'd go through it again too, if I had ta. It's real nice ta have 
     =
     >> ya
          >> back. I just wish we knew what Hydras weakness is. =
The problem is that
          >> guy's got too many sets of eyes on 'em and=
 in his alt form... Wait Thats 
          >> it,
          >> why didn't I =
think of this before? Nightlight, I get it now. I bet that 
          >> if=

          >> he lost all visual capabilities, Hydras would be severely com=
promised. 
          >> On
          >> the other hand, Tucson lost the las=
t fight because Hydras had 'em at a
          >> disadvantage. But if Tucso=
n took out all his visual circuitry, then he
          >> would have the up=
per hand. Tucson's been blind a long time, it's second
          >> nature =
ta him ta fight that way. But it's not for Hydras. "
          >>
         =
 >> He turns his head over to Bump.
          >>
          >> " How would w=
e go about knock'n out Hydras visual circuitry?"
          >
          >
  =
        > <NEW>
          >
          > There was a noncommital shrug from =
BUMP, "Well a simple flash-bang
          > grenade could do it. It is basi=
cally a bright light followed by a
          > deafening noise." He shrugge=
d again, "I am not typically a weapons
          > engineer, but they shoul=
d be in the weapons stores."
          >
          > BUMP glanced at the re=
adouts displaying NIGHTLIGHT's vital signs,
          > nodding when everyt=
hing looked good. He looked back at NIGHTSHIFT,
          > "Did you have a=
nything specific in mind?"
          >
          > (TAG)
          >
      =
    > Preston
          >

      <D=
IV> </DIV>
      <DIV>" And don't ever let anyone take that away from =
ya.  Love is 
      more valuable than energon and it lasts forever.&n=
bsp; There's plenty of 
      that here alright, lets hope we can hold inta=
 that for a long time. 
"</DIV>
      <DIV> </DIV>
      <DIV>He shift=
s his position on the repair bench.</DIV>
      <DIV> </DIV>
      <DI=
V>" This sure reminds me of Ratchet's med bay.  I must've ended up 
  =
    there so many times that I lost count.  But it wasn't for stupid 
=
      reasons, usually because of freak ambush attempts by Decepticon 
    =
  speedsters.  I sure hated those guys, I wasn't as fast as they were =

      and they knew it.  So of course they'd always chose me as their=
 
      target.  Ratchet was aware of that, and he never got agitated =
when I 
      came in.  But what was worse, I'd never hear the end of =
it from 
      Sunstreaker and Sideswipe.  Slag, those two were always=
 rank'n on 
      me.  But I tried ta ignore 'em.  Then one day, =
Ohh this is 
      sweet, one day it happened again and I wound back up in =
Ratchet's office. 
      Tucson was mak'n a delivery of supplies before he =
got shot blind, and 
      those two were pull'n their scrap on me.  W=
ell, not only did he hear 
      them, he saw them do'n it and slag, you di=
dn't wanna be around Tucson that 
      time, because he had the look of de=
struction in his eyes.  Now mind 
      ya, they knew better not ta sc=
rap around with him because he'd slag 'em 
      real good if they did.&nbs=
p; All they had ta do was look into his optics 
      and they turned aroun=
d and apologized ta me without a single word outa 
      Tucson's mouth.&nb=
sp; After that, it never happened again."</DIV>
      <DIV> </DIV>
   =
   <DIV>He sighs gently.</DIV>
      <DIV> </DIV>
      <DIV>" Happy t=
a say that there was never any ridicule ever said about 
      anyone after=
 that.  Optimus was glad about that, so he let Tucson's 
      temper =
slide somewhat.  It kept the speedsters in line and guys like 
      u=
s, Hound, Trail Breaker, and Beach Comber were happy not ta get ranked on 
=
      because of our lack of speed.  And definitely no one ever messed=
 with 
      Ratchet.  Ohh no, that was considered taboo.  Maan I=
 sure miss 
      those times."</DIV>
